summary: A private detective is drawn into a complex murder mystery when he is hired to track down a missing young woman.
cast: Aaron Kwok|Kai Chi Liu|Tak-Bun Wong|Siu-Ming Lau|Yiu-Cheung Lai|Fui-On Shing|Tin-Ngoh Seung|Jo Kuk|Suet Man Choi|Natthasinee Pinyopiyavid|Chaiyapong Settagam|Naratid Namkang|Sriak Boonsomrat|Mantanakarn Lhaomang|Sarunjit Lelapisan|Nupan Surkaj|Saman Wongpromkal|Willies Kwok|Keok-Fai Chu|Yuk-Lan Chong|Orapin Chongsujipung|Hin-Wai Au
director: Director: Oxide Chun Pang (as Oxide Pang)
title: C+ jing taam
